column4: hi, I have 4gb freespace and 512 mb of ram, how should i partition this space?
one 4GB Reiserfs/XFS partition, plus swapfile on it if you really need that much vram.
i heard , if i have different partition for my files and my system, my sys will be faster
if you really have only 4GB for Linux, go for one partition. Any other setup will simply waste your disk space needlessly.
